trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_000<tab>Hmm... Thou art unlike the others─this place ill befits thee. Do not tarry overlong...

TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_010<tab>The telling of my tale alters not its course. If thou knowest my brethren once ruled these skies, will our kingdom return? Should I boast that I was first among our hunters, will the comrades I failed live again?
TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_011<tab>Nay. Once, I lived, and now I await the coming oblivion. Nothing more.
TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_020<tab>This? This is not our home. To our home did come the metal demons, who of life and joy scoured it clean.
TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_021<tab>These are mere bones, and among them do we rest our wings forevermore.
TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_022<tab>Leave us now to our mourning, traveler. Thou wilt find no solace here.
TEXT_REGUNI5REAHTAHRA_00758_FOHLOLOH_000_023<tab>Yet now, I sense a stirring... Passions that should no longer live within this tomb...
